==Translingual==

===Etymology===
{{Han simp|銘|f=釒|t=钅}}.

In current form {{Han compound|金|alt1=钅|t1=metal|名|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – engrave in metal. Note that 名 means “name”, hence connotations of “engrave a name in metal”.
